import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../../style/adopt_1_main.css"; import axios from "axios"; class AdoptMain extends Component { state = { adoptList: [], page:[1] }; async componentDidMount() { const results = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/adopt/${this.state.page}`); // console.log(results); const maxPage = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/adopt/maxPage`) let newState = { ...this.state }; newState.adoptList = results.data; this.setState(newState); } render() { return (

排序 :

{adoptItem.animal_variety}
{adoptItem.animal_color}

))}

); } } export default AdoptMain;
